title: Can you identify this Typeface??
content:
Hello :)

Wondering if anyone can tell me what this typeface may be or if you know of a similar one?

Thanks!!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829120739im_/http:/typophile.com/files/elders_5026.jpg)
author: AleshaB

comments.content: I can't find an exact match, but you may like **[LHF Royal Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829120739/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Letterhead&ffam=LHF%20Royal%20Script%20Extended%20-%20Regular&fid=5871a7bf23421f1a96b354377903fb89&fstyle=i&fsize=60&text=Elders&fit=1)** by Tom Kennedy [Letterhead, 2003] or **[Lobster](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829120739/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-1&ffam=Lobster%201.4%20-%20Regular&fid=75cde7a913630473b1207d3727eadda9&fstyle=i&fsize=60&text=Elders&fit=1)** by Pablo Impallari [2010]
